Author: ravenslofty
Content: this simulation model is not IEEE 1364.1 compliant, as far as I can tell

Author: ravenslofty
Content:
```verilog
module gf180mcu_as_sc_mcu7t3v3__dfsrtp_2(
        input VPW,
        input VNW,
        input VDD,
        input VSS,

        input CLK,
        input D,
        input RN,
        input SN,
        output Q
);

reg state;

assign Q = state;

always @(posedge CLK or negedge RN or negedge SN) begin
        if (RN == 1'b0) begin
                state <= 1'b0;
        end else if (SN == 1'b0) begin
                state <= 1'b1;
        end else begin
                state <= D;
        end
end

endmodule
```
